last_episode_to_air.name: Brainwashing
last_episode_to_air.overview: What does it mean to be brainwashed? From the Satanic panic of the ’80s to current conspiracies, dive into how belief change happens inside the brain.

name: The Mind, Explained
overview: Ever wonder what's happening inside your head? From dreaming to anxiety disorders, discover how your brain works with this illuminating series.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Ever wonder what's happening inside your head? From dreaming to anxiety disorders, discover how your brain works with this illuminating series.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Our minds are capable of great things, but they can also undermine our best intentions. Delve into the science behind creativity, brainwashing and more.

episodes.name: Memory
episodes.overview: How does remembering work? Delve into the way the brain stores, processes and retrieves memories -- and why certain ones sometimes prove unreliable.

episodes.name: Dreams
episodes.overview: Why do we dream? When the lights go out, interesting things happen in the brain and body. What’s the significance of dreams, and what can they teach us?

episodes.name: Anxiety
episodes.overview: Feeling anxious? You're not alone. Stand-up comedian Maria Bamford shares her personal experience with OCD in this examination of anxiety disorders.

episodes.name: Mindfulness
episodes.overview: Take a deep, cleansing breath and slowly exhale while being enlightened on the impact meditation can have on your mind and body.

episodes.name: Psychedelics
episodes.overview: What happens to a brain on psychedelics? Turn on, tune in and drop out on this trip to explore the history and effects of mind-altering substances.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Ever wonder what's happening inside your head? From dreaming to anxiety disorders, discover how your brain works with this illuminating series.

episodes.name: How to Focus
episodes.overview: So... many... distractions. Sustaining attention is harder than ever, but not for the reasons you might expect. Experts focus on the many challenges.

episodes.name: Teenage Brain
episodes.overview: Why do teenagers act... like teenagers? Hint: It's not just hormones. Neuroscience explains the fundamentally unique way a teen's brain operates.

episodes.name: Personality
episodes.overview: Personality tests group people into handy types but reveal only part of the story. Learn how our personalities develop and evolve over a lifetime.

episodes.name: Creativity
episodes.overview: Creativity isn't a mystical force — it's a mental muscle. See how your neural networks generate fresh ideas and learn ways to foster your imagination.

episodes.name: Brainwashing
episodes.overview: What does it mean to be brainwashed? From the Satanic panic of the ’80s to current conspiracies, dive into how belief change happens inside the brain.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Our minds are capable of great things, but they can also undermine our best intentions. Delve into the science behind creativity, brainwashing and more.
